title: Simple Omelette Recipe
mainDescription: An easy and quick dish, perfect for any meal. This classic omelette combines beaten eggs cooked to perfection, optionally filled with your choice of cheese, vegetables, or meats.
instructions: In a bowl, beat the eggs with a pinch of pepper until they are well mixed.You can add a teaspoon of milk or warer to create a more fluffed texture.
Place a non-stick frying pan on a medium heat and butter or oil.
Once the butter is melted and bubbling, pour in the eggs, Tilt the pan to make sure the eggs evenly coat the surface.
When the eggs begin to set off the edge but are still slightly runny in the middle, sprinly your cheese fillign on half the omelette.
As teh omeltte continues to cook. carefully lift one edge and fold it.
Serve hot, add additional salt and pepper if needed.
